articles.title: Over one-third of Pakistan underwater, overflowing Indus creates long lake
articles.description: More than 1,100 people have died from the floods since mid-June, nearly 400 of them children, while millions have been displaced, according to Pakistan's National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA). | World News
